The sequel to Counter-Strike has challenges and a great online player base. This game is still played in many areas of the world, so no less problems about ping. And one of the most important things for an online shooter, friendly people. The people are really awesome! No swearing, just playing.
A good game only took about 2 hours to beat and got all the challenges on my first try. On easy mode, I havent played the other difficulaties yet.

Muy buen Juego, aparte de que puedes jugarlo multijugador con tus amigos y otras personas de lugares diferentes, tienes la disponibilidad de jugar, missiones si se puede decir asi en el que si los completas obtienes tu medalla aparte por los retos que se encuentran te ayuda a mejorar tu jugabilidad en el Counter Strike...   Muy recomendado
This is a classic! Played CS when I was 13, now I'm back at it at 26 and it's till just as great! truly doesn't get old.

Counter Strike: Condition Zero 

This is basically old good 1.6 with better graphics and better bots. The bots are a great way to practice cs. There is also singleplayer tour of duty, that is basically counter strike missions against bots. Challenges include for example: kill 3 enemies with a sniper rifle. Great cs. If you liked any cs games, try this.

Grade: 10/10

My summary in 4 sentences:
A game in the series that doesnt get much attention,unlike source for an example.Its the only in the franchise to have solo missions.There are very few players still playing tho,so you are basically buying 3 hours of missions against bots.The Deleted Scenes version has a story and a few more maps,if you can buy only that instead.
I got this from the Valve pack and it's way too old and boring. Also the AI is very dumb.
It is retextured cs 1.6 with missions.

If you are looking for a great Single Player Counter Strike, CS:CZ is not your stuff because its basically put you & some bot allies vs some bots in a normal match.

2/10 Its just CS with bots

CS:CZ Deleted Scenes in other hand is your stuff, its a set of Half Life like level with CS laws applied and the difficulty only alter the bot's accuracy and reaction time so no AK-47 headshot not instakilling.

8/10 Would kills Army of Japanese Guerilla to save anime thot CS style.
